title: Healdata-utils Demonstration Data Dictionary
description: This is a proof of concept to demonstrate the healdata-utils functionality

data_dictionary.name: id
data_dictionary.title: data commons person identifier
data_dictionary.description: The generated unique identifier specific for a given individual (client or staff).

data_dictionary.name: age
data_dictionary.title: Age
data_dictionary.description: About how old are you? (top coded at 90)

data_dictionary.name: sex_at_birth
data_dictionary.title: Sex at birth
data_dictionary.description: What sex was originally listed on your birth certificate?

data_dictionary.name: gender_id
data_dictionary.title: Gender Identity
data_dictionary.description: What is your gender identity?

enum: Genderqueer/gender nonconforming/neither exclusively male nor female

data_dictionary.name: gender_id_condensed
data_dictionary.title: Gender Identity (condensed)
data_dictionary.description: What is your gender identity?

data_dictionary.name: race_white
data_dictionary.title: Race: White
data_dictionary.description: [White] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_black
data_dictionary.title: Race: Black or African American
data_dictionary.description: [Black or African American] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_AIAN
data_dictionary.title: Race: American Indian or Alaska Native
data_dictionary.description: [American Indian or Alaska Native] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_hawaiian_OPI
data_dictionary.title: Race: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
data_dictionary.description: [Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_asian
data_dictionary.title: Race: Asian
data_dictionary.description: [Asian] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_other
data_dictionary.title: Race: Other
data_dictionary.description: [Other] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_AI_tribe
data_dictionary.title: Race: American indian principal tribe or community specified
data_dictionary.description: [American indian principal tribe or community specified] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_other_specified
data_dictionary.title: Race: Other specified
data_dictionary.description: [Other specified] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: hispanic_latino
data_dictionary.title: Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish Origin
data_dictionary.description: Are you of Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin?

data_dictionary.name: sex_orient_category
data_dictionary.title: Sexual orientation
data_dictionary.description: Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself asâ€¦

data_dictionary.name: sex_orient_other
data_dictionary.title: Sexual orientation:  Other specified
data_dictionary.description: Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself asâ€¦

data_dictionary.name: ever_pregnant
data_dictionary.title: Ever pregnant
data_dictionary.description: Have you ever been pregnant?

enum: Previously pregnant, did not have a child

data_dictionary.name: marital_status
data_dictionary.title: Marital status
data_dictionary.description: What is your marital status?

data_dictionary.name: living_as_married
data_dictionary.title: Married with partner
data_dictionary.description: Are you currently living as married with a romantic partner?

enum: Yes, I am living as married with partner
No, I am not living as married with partner

data_dictionary.name: educ_category
data_dictionary.title: Education
data_dictionary.description: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

enum: Some college credit but less than 1 year of college credit
1 or more years of college credit but no degree
Graduate degree (e.g., MSW, MA, MS, JD, MD, DSW, EdD, PhD)

data_dictionary.name: educ_highest_grade
data_dictionary.title: Education:  Highest grade level (if less than GED or h.s. diploma)
data_dictionary.description: What is the highest grade completed?

data_dictionary.name: educ_other_specified
data_dictionary.title: Education: Other specified
data_dictionary.description: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?
